description:
Tasmanian Wolves are thought to be extinct until a local farmer declares he has spotted unmistakable tracks. Of course, Rataleone wants to cash in on the reward for trapping the unfortunate animal and sends his Bad Rats to hunt it down. The Bamboo Bears set off in pursuit of the hunters and the hunted. They begin to wonder whether Tasmanian Wolves are extinct after all...
Source: bcdb.com
